alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Indian River, southeastern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kenansville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Sebastian, Fellsmere, Roseland and Barefoot Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
